name: touhoucirno.zip
items: Touhou - Cirno in Streets of Frog.sh

attr.title: Touhou: Cirno in Streets of Frog
attr.desc: Yokai Mountain Megacity is under attack by the criminal Frog Syndicate, and it's up to the strongest undercover fairy police officer to stop it! Punch, kick and parry your way through an onslaught of pizza-throwing knights, pop culture references, frogs and breakable crates in this frantic arcade action game!
attr.inst: Go to the game's page https://yaru.itch.io/touhou-streets-of-frog, download the game and place the zip file into gamedata folder.
